description: Retrieves information about all the activities for a campaign.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the application. This identifier is displayed as the Project ID on the Amazon Pinpoint console.

parameters.name: CampaignId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.

nested_items.name: ActivitiesResponse
nested_items.description: Provides information about the activities that were performed by a campaign.

nested_items.name: Item
nested_items.description: An array of responses, one for each activity that was performed by the campaign.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the application that the campaign applies to.

nested_items.name: CampaignId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the campaign that the activity applies to.

nested_items.name: End
nested_items.description: The actual time, in ISO 8601 format, when the activity was marked CANCELLED or COMPLETED.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the activity.

nested_items.name: Result
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the activity succeeded. Possible values are SUCCESS and FAIL.

nested_items.name: ScheduledStart
nested_items.description: The scheduled start time, in ISO 8601 format, for the activity.

nested_items.name: Start
nested_items.description: The actual start time, in ISO 8601 format, of the activity.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current status of the activity. Possible values are: PENDING, INITIALIZING, RUNNING, PAUSED, CANCELLED, and COMPLETED.

nested_items.name: SuccessfulEndpointCount
nested_items.description: The total number of endpoints that the campaign successfully delivered messages to.

nested_items.name: TimezonesCompletedCount
nested_items.description: The total number of time zones that were completed.

nested_items.name: TimezonesTotalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of unique time zones that are in the segment for the campaign.

nested_items.name: TotalEndpointCount
nested_items.description: The total number of endpoints that the campaign attempted to deliver messages to.

nested_items.name: TreatmentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the campaign treatment that the activity applies to. A treatment is a variation of a campaign that's used for A/B testing of a campaign.

nested_items.name: ExecutionMetrics
nested_items.description: A JSON object that contains metrics relating to the campaign execution for this campaign activity. For information about the structure and contents of the results, see Standard Amazon Pinpoint analytics metrics in the Amazon Pinpoint Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The string to use in a subsequent request to get the next page of results in a paginated response. This value is null if there are no additional pages.
